mapper.select: SELECT ROLE_CODE, ROLE_NM, ROLE_PTTRN, ROLE_DC, ROLE_TY, ROLE_SORT, ROLE_CREAT_DE FROM LETTNROLEINFO WHERE ROLE_CODE = #{roleCode}

SELECT ROLE_CODE, ROLE_NM, ROLE_PTTRN, ROLE_DC, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM029' AND CODE = ROLE_TY) AS ROLE_TY, ROLE_SORT, ROLE_CREAT_DE FROM LETTNROLEINFO WHERE 1=1 AND ROLE_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY ROLE_CREAT_DE DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
